description: This file defines the interface IGuide within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It provides virtual methods for managing TV guide information, notifications, parental controls, and channel/program data. It also defines a nested interface INotification for event notifications related to the guide system.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: Interface for TV guide management, parent controls, and notifications.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: Interface for guide notification events such as broadcasts and alerts.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the guide parser with the provided shell.

methods.name: GetChannels
methods.description: Retrieves the list of available channels.

methods.name: GetPrograms
methods.description: Retrieves the list of current programs.

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Gets information about the current program for a specific channel.

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets available audio languages for a given program.

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Gets available subtitle languages for a given program.

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is enabled.

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Locks or unlocks parental controls for a specific channel or content.

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if a specific content or channel is parental locked.

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
